document_data.caption: A map showing Unthangol Pass in Unther.
document_data.name: Unthangol Pass
document_data.mainbody: '''Unthangol Pass''' was a mountain pass located in southern [[Unther]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Unthangol Pass cut through the middle of the [[Unthangol Mountains]], allowing for passage between southern Unther and the [[Shaar]].
